setExtras(android.os.Bundle).Description: Set optional extras for the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#CustomAction_E@. These extras are meant to be consumed by a @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat_E@ if it knows how to handle them. Keys should be fully qualified (e.g. "com.example.MY_ARG") to avoid collisions.

build().Description: Build and return the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#CustomAction_E@ instance with the specified values.

Parameters: CharSequence: The display name of the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#CustomAction_E@. This name will be displayed along side the action if the UI supports it.

int: The icon resource id of the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#CustomAction_E@. This resource id must be in the same package as the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaSessionCompat_E@. It will be displayed with the custom action if the UI supports it.
PlaybackStateCompat.CustomAction.Builder.Description: Creates a @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#CustomAction_E@ builder with the id, name, and icon set.
PlaybackStateCompat.CustomAction.Builder.FullName: public PlaybackStateCompat.CustomAction.Builder (String action, CharSequence name, int icon)
